channel.title: A few questions about a 562 server
channel.description:
Hello. It's been a while sense I've been here. I recently set up a 562 server and client on my web site.
I need a little help:
[s]First: Moving objects. In the old days there was an objects.cfg. Now all I can find is a objects.dat. I need to move a portal from one place to another.[/s] Solved:ActionSender.java in net source folder.
Second: Is there a way to see the npc, item, and object ID's in game? Like a debug command?
[s]Third: How do I change the player teleport spell locations. I searched forever and could not find the player teleport java file. I did find how to edit player spells and their power and such but not the teleports. [/s] Solved: ActionButtonPacketHandler.java
Fourth: Is there a tutorial on how to make item pickups a single click? Right now, when someone drops something you have to walk over it and click it again. Same with trading NPS's. How would I go about making this a single click?
I'm new to the 562 and have searched for ever on my own. Any help??
Thanks guys!

item.title: A few questions about a 562 server
item.dc:creator: @cdoggy cdoggy
item.description:
@cdoggy wrote:

Hello. It’s been a while sense I’ve been here. I recently set up a 562 server and client on my web site.

I need a little help:

First: Moving objects. In the old days there was an objects.cfg. Now all I can find is a objects.dat. I need to move a portal from one place to another.
Solved:ActionSender.java in net source folder.

Second: Is there a way to see the npc, item, and object ID’s in game? Like a debug command?

Third: How do I change the player teleport spell locations. I searched forever and could not find the player teleport java file. I did find how to edit player spells and their power and such but not the teleports.
Solved: ActionButtonPacketHandler.java

Fourth: Is there a tutorial on how to make item pickups a single click? Right now, when someone drops something you have to walk over it and click it again. Same with trading NPS’s. How would I go about making this a single click?

I’m new to the 562 and have searched for ever on my own. Any help??

Thanks guys!

Read full topic
item.source: A few questions about a 562 server
